attributes.action: The United Kingdom should officially recognise Taiwan as an independent nation.
attributes.background: It is time to recognise Taiwan and support its inclusion in international bodies. The time of bowing down to the wishes of the Chinese Communist Party are over. As Brexit becomes a reality we need some bold statements of Britain's intent.
